text: I think you've actually got an unclosed div or something somewhere in one of your about_content modules. If you inspect the DOM, you can see that the last 3 groups are all being considered children of about_content.

Hello all—attempting to use a module so a client can set their own background image—unfortunately, doesn't seem to work as expected. Instead of using the variable it simple shows up as blank (as in `background: url()`). Help is much appreciated!
For anyone else who may have this issue, apparently HubL can't be parsed in CSS/JavaScript. Moved it inline and changed the variable to `{{ module.background_image.src }}`. Worked like a charm!
